name: Flea NES Game DEMO
description:
Flea is a brand new game for the Nintendo Entertainment System. This hard as nails platformer has you traverse inside and outside a great beast. Your a flea and you never stop jumping which only adds to the challenge ahead. Meet interesting characters and learn about the beast.

the game is made in Nesmaker.
http://trollburner.thenew8bitheroes.com/the-tools.html

Kickstarter coming soon!

Link will be here on the 29th of feb when its live.
